korean: 조금만 더 빨리 걸었으면 탈 수 있었는데 눈앞에서 버스가 떠났다.
손 흔들며 뛰어갔지만 기사님이 못 본 것 같아.
english: If I had walked just a bit faster I could've caught it, but the bus left right before my eyes.
I ran waving my hand, but I don't think the driver saw me.
I have to wait 20 minutes for the next bus.
It's an unlucky day from the morning.
